itemDescription: British soldier, Royal Navy officer, Liberal politician, author and adventurer (1922-1991)

wikipedia_page.main: Adrian John Liddell Hart (1922–1991) was a British soldier, Royal Navy officer, Liberal politician, author and adventurer. He served briefly in the French Foreign Legion and portrayed it in the 1953 book Strange Company.

link_mentions.page: List of Old Etonians born in the 20th century
